name: Artak

skills.name: Chaosrazor
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 35% chance to extend the duration of any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE. 35% chance to extend HP Burn debuffs.

skills.notes: Synergizes with A3 for long HP Burn uptime.

skills.name: Dogs Of War
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE. Instantly activates HP Burn debuffs. 75% chance to place Decrease ATK.

skills.notes: HP Burn activation is key for Spider, Hydra, and boss content.

skills.name: Purifyre
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Restores this Champion’s destroyed MAX HP by 10% for each [HP Burn] debuff placed by this skill. Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP for each [HP Burn] debuff attempt blocked or resisted by the enemy team.

effects.notes: Double hit. First hit can place HP Burn. Restores destroyed MAX HP and heals on resist.

skills.notes: Restores destroyed MAX HP and heals on resist.

skills.name: Burning Blood
skills.description: Whenever a [HP Burn] debuff is activated, destroys this champion's MAX HP by 5% (stacks up to 50%). Increases this Champion’s DMG, C.DMG, and DEF by 1% for each 1% of their destroyed MAX HP. Also increases this Champion’s SPD and RES by 2 for each 1% of their destroyed MAX HP.

effects.notes: Destroys 5% of own MAX HP whenever HP Burn is activated (stacks up to 50%).
Increases DMG, C.DMG, DEF by 1% per 1% destroyed MAX HP; SPD and RES by 2 per 1% destroyed MAX HP.

skills.notes: Unique mechanic: stat scaling at the cost of destroyed MAX HP.

forms.comments: Artak is a top-tier HP Burn specialist for Spider, Hydra, and solo dungeon content. His passive enables unique stat scaling but requires careful management of destroyed MAX HP.

stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: HP%, SPD, ACC, C.RATE, C.DMG, DEF%
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: HP%, SPD, ACC, C.RATE, C.DMG, RES

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use HP Burn and activation skills appropriately. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: HP Burn activation and self-healing allow for soloing Spider, Hydra, and dungeons.

mechanics_advisory: Artak's HP Burn activation and stat-scaling passive make him a unique and powerful option for boss and solo content. Build for HP, speed, and accuracy.
